meanings.definition: Not belonging to the legume family of plants.
meanings.sent1: The farmer planted a variety of nonleguminous crops in the field.
meanings.sent2: The salad was nonleguminous, as it did not have any beans or peas.
meanings.sent3: The nonleguminous garden seemed to be in a competition with the neighboring legume patch.
meanings.sent4: Her nonleguminous personality stood out in a crowd of extroverted legume enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The nonleguminous trees swayed gently in the breeze, distinct from the legume plants nearby.

meanings.sent1: The soup was deliciously nonleguminous, perfect for those with bean allergies.
meanings.sent2: The bakery offered a variety of nonleguminous pastries for customers with dietary restrictions.
meanings.sent3: The nonleguminous stew surprised everyone with its rich flavor despite the absence of beans.
meanings.sent4: Her nonleguminous diet made her stand out among her legume-loving friends.
meanings.sent5: The nonleguminous dish was a hit at the potluck, pleasing even the legume enthusiasts.

meanings.sent1: The nonleguminous plant had vibrant flowers that attracted butterflies.
meanings.sent2: The nonleguminous soil was perfect for growing a variety of vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The nonleguminous conversation at the dinner table veered towards gardening tips.
meanings.sent4: Her nonleguminous interests included painting and hiking, far from the world of legumes.
meanings.sent5: The nonleguminous landscape was a refreshing change from the usual legume fields.
